predicate.note: Frames file for 'wither' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entries 47.2 and 45.5.

example.name: not a plant
example.text: Despite seeing his plan for Israeli-Palestinian elections wither, the cautious secretary of state is so far unwilling to cut U.S. economic or military aid to force Israeli cooperation.

example.name: with cause
example.text: The hot sun withered John's houseplants.
